prediction.overall_explanation: This contract is a simple view-only permission condition that checks if an account's combined token balance (wallet + locked) meets a minimum threshold. It has no state-changing functions, no external calls that could enable reentrancy, and properly uses immutable variables set in constructor. The unused parameters pattern is intentional per the interface. While it depends on external contracts (plugin, lockManager, token), those are trust assumptions inherent to the design, not vulnerabilities in this contract's code.
